title: Multi-Tenant Order Management API
description: Backend API that allows businesses to manage users, products, and orders with secure Stripe payment links, enforcing strict multi-tenant isolation and role-based access control.
impact: Enabled businesses to securely manage users, orders, and payments in a multi-tenant system.

image.alt: Diagram showing multi-tenant API architecture and request flow

title: DSA Compendium
description: A collection of data structures and algorithms in Python, showcasing multiple problem-solving approaches and explanations.
impact: Highlights algorithmic proficiency and problem-solving skills.

image.alt: Illustration representing algorithms and data structures
